title: Elegant Shropshire Countryside Manor Close to Ironbridge with 18-Hole Golf Course
description:
The elegance of the English countryside is yours to enjoy at The Telford Hotel & Golf Resort, a stunning restored 17th-century Darby House set within sweeping gardens. Whether it's a romantic getaway, a golfing weekend, or a spontaneous countryside escape, The Telford Hotel suits every traveller. 

Spend days on the green at the superb 18-hole golf course practicing your swing, indulge at the award-winning day spa with a pampering treatment, and treat your tastebuds to a journey into fine dining at Restaurant 1779 or Gorge Bar & Lounge. When you can tear yourself away from the exceptional facilities, the charms of historic Shropshire are at your fingertips. Right outside your door is the UNESCO World Heritage listed-site of Ironbridge Gorge, while Severn Valley (known as the birthplace of industry) is brimming with picturesque towns like Shrewsbury, Ludlow and Bridgnorth.
offer_address: Great Hay Dr, Sutton Way, Telford TF7 4DT, United Kingdom
